name: Forever, watching Perseids
description:
An essay for KRITIQAL's Forgotten Games Jam in which I talk about a game that was very meaningful to me: Freya Campbell's wonderful Perseids, or, All this will go on Forever.

It's forgotten in the sense of "a chance to remember those games that meant something to you but that never broke through to a larger audience."

(This essay works on mobile, but the pictures are better -- for the moment -- on PC.)

Made in Ink using Elliot Herriman's excellent Calico.
